instructions: Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 1 1 Tap the WhatsApp icon to open it. The icon looks like a white phone inside a speech bubble on a green background. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 2 2 Tap . This option is in the bottom right corner of the screen. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 3 3 Tap . Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 4 4 Tap . Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 5 5 Tap . Choose whether you want to back up your messages daily, weekly, or monthly. If you haven't previously set up your iCloud account, you'll be prompted to do so here before continuing with the backup. Open the iPhone's Settings app, tap your name, tap iCloud , make sure the iCloud Drive toggle is set to On, and make sure the WhatsApp toggle is also set to On. Advertisement

This brings up a dialog window asking you to confirm that you wish to delete WhatsApp. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 8 3 Tap . The app is deleted from your iPhone. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 9 4 Reinstall WhatsApp from the App Store. Tap the App Store icon to open it. The icon looks like a white letter A on a blue background. Tap the Image titled Android7search.png icon and enter 'WhatsApp' in the search field. Tap in the search results. Tap the icon to download WhatsApp again. The icon is right next to the app's name. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 10 5 Tap the icon to open WhatsApp. The Open icon replaces the Get icon once the app has completed downloading. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 11 6 Tap , then tap . Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 12 7 Tap or . This determines whether the app can send you notifications. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 13 8 Enter your phone number and tap . Make sure the phone number is the same one you used with the previous installation of WhatsApp. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 14 9 Tap , then tap . This retrieves any chat messages that were previously backed up to your iCloud account. This includes messages that were deleted from WhatsApp, so long as those messages existed when the last backup was made. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 15 10 Enter the display name you wish to use and tap . This brings you to the Chats page. Image titled Retrieve Old WhatsApp Messages Step 16 11 Tap any name in this list. Doing so brings up all restored chats associated with that contact. [1] Advertisement
